title: Tribe Nine Tier List
description: Explore the latest Tribe Nine character tier list, ranking heroes from S to C Tier based on their abilities and performance.
heading: Tribe Nine Tier List
introText: Explore the latest Tribe Nine character tier list, ranking heroes from S to C Tier based on their abilities and performance.

data.itemDescription: A powerful character with solid attack and support abilities, capable of unleashing a potent area-of-effect (AoE) attack
Boasts incredibly high attack power, utilizing ranged attacks and deploying crystals that act as turrets
Excels in high attack ability, wielding a giant broadsword for devastating melee attacks
A tank character who grows stronger as he withstands attacks, with abilities that restore HP and increase damage output when stacked
A well-rounded character with extremely high break ability, capable of entering a berserk state to deal increased damage
An all-rounder specialized in creating openings and executing deflects. Excels at breaking enemies to stagger them and chaining team attacks together
Specializes in poison attacks that deal damage over time and deplete enemy defense points
A long-range attacker with no standout qualities and very low stats
A long-range attacker who stacks enhanced attacks for a powerful ultimate, capable of buffing teammates and impairing enemies
A balanced character capable of both healing and dealing damage, but hampered by susceptibility to exhaustion if used incorrectly
An exceptional support focused on team survival through recovery and shield abilities
A support character who recharges teammates' ultimate skills but suffers from very low battle stats
Features a unique moveset centered on ability stacking and shield generation for teammates, but at personal cost
Possesses an unusual moveset best used for drawing enemy fire, crowd control, and emergency evasion with his one-time guaranteed dodge
